MTM.Summary: Increasing focus on AI and blockchain technology.

MTM.Goals: Complete AI course, apply AI in investment strategies
MTM.Transition: Shifting career focus towards technology integration.

LTM.Lessons: Importance of time management, seeking help, balancing priorities

LTM.Lessons: Importance of seizing opportunities, balancing academic and professional growth, following intuition.
